title: “Don’t @ me” tweets might soon become a thing of the past
content:
After several years of users clamoring for an edit button, Twitter finally relented earlier this week and confirmed that it will be available for Twitter Blue Labs users in the coming months. description: Twitter is testing a new Unmentioning feature that will make "Don't @ me!" tweets a thing of the past. Read on to learn more.
